title: Atmospheric Sci-Fi Music Pack
description: 10 seamlessly loopable, atmospheric sci-fi tracks designed for games with sci-fi or futuristic themes
longDescription:
This pack contains 10 seamlessly loopable sci-fi tracks (16-bit, 44.1kHz wav files) and 22 mins, 57 secs of original music.

 

Whether it's a sci-fi-survival horror or puzzle game, futuristic FPS, Metroidvania platformer or a relaxing space simulator, if your game has sci-fi or space themes, there's something in this pack for you! Icy synths, spacey keys, and techno-babbling SFX can be found throughout this galactic music pack. Ideal for game devs that want a more ambient sound to their sci-fi project instead of synthwave or cyberpunk.


You can listen to the music pack in full before purchase here: https://soundcloud.com/aleksis_tristan_shaw/sets/atmospheric-sci-fi-music
